trans-unit.resname: C14·1 | Angel of the Dire Hour | Card Name
C14·1 | Angel of the Dire Hour | Card Text | Paragraph 1
C14·1 | Angel of the Dire Hour | Card Text | Paragraph 2
C14·1 | Angel of the Dire Hour | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand, exile all attacking creatures.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，若你从你手上施放之，则放逐所有进行攻击的生物。

trans-unit.resname: C14·2 | Angelic Field Marshal | Card Name
C14·2 | Angelic Field Marshal | Card Text | Paragraph 1
C14·2 | Angelic Field Marshal | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Lieutenant — As long as you control your commander, CARDNAME gets +2/+2 and creatures you control have vigilance.
trans-unit.target: 副官～只要你操控你的指挥官，CARDNAME便得+2/+2且由你操控的生物具有警戒异能。

trans-unit.resname: C14·3 | Benevolent Offering | Card Name
C14·3 | Benevolent Offering | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose an opponent. You and that player each create three 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.
trans-unit.target: 选择一位对手。你和该牌手各派出三个1/1白色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: C14·3 | Benevolent Offering | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Choose an opponent. You gain 2 life for each creature you control and that player gains 2 life for each creature they control.
trans-unit.target: 选择一位对手。你每操控一个生物，你便获得2点生命，且该牌手每操控一个生物，他便获得2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: C14·4 | Comeuppance | Card Name
C14·4 | Comeuppance | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you and planeswalkers you control this turn by sources you don't control. If damage from a creature source is prevented this way, CARDNAME deals that much damage to that creature. If damage from a noncreature source is prevented this way, CARDNAME deals that much damage to the source's controller.
trans-unit.target: 于本回合中，防止不由你操控的来源将对你和由你操控的鹏洛客造成的所有伤害。如果以此法防止了某个来源为生物的伤害，则CARDNAME对该生物造成等量的伤害。如果以此法防止了某个来源为非生物的伤害，则CARDNAME对该来源的操控者造成等量的伤害。

trans-unit.resname: C14·5 | Containment Priest | Card Name
C14·5 | Containment Priest | Card Text | Paragraph 1
C14·5 | Containment Priest | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: If a nontoken creature would enter the battlefield and it wasn't cast, exile it instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果某非衍生物的生物将进战场，且未有牌手施放之，则改为将它放逐。

trans-unit.resname: C14·6 | Deploy to the Front | Card Name
C14·6 | Deploy to the Front | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Create X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens, where X is the number of creatures on the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 派出X个1/1白色士兵衍生生物，X为战场上的生物数量。

trans-unit.resname: C14·7 | Fell the Mighty | Card Name
C14·7 | Fell the Mighty | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy all creatures with power greater than target creature's power.
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有力量大于目标生物的生物。

trans-unit.resname: C14·8 | Hallowed Spiritkeeper | Card Name
C14·8 | Hallowed Spiritkeeper | Card Text | Paragraph 1
C14·8 | Hallowed Spiritkeeper | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, create X 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去时，派出X个1/1白色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物，X为你坟墓场中的生物牌数量。

trans-unit.resname: C14·9 | Jazal Goldmane | Card Name
C14·9 | Jazal Goldmane | Card Text | Paragraph 1
C14·9 | Jazal Goldmane | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {3}{W}{W}: Attacking creatures you control get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of attacking creatures.
trans-unit.target: {3}{W}{W}：由你操控且进行攻击的生物得+X/+X直到回合结束，X为进行攻击的生物数量。

trans-unit.resname: C14·10 | Nahiri, the Lithomancer | Card Name
C14·10 | Nahiri, the Lithomancer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: [+2]: Create a 1/1 white Kor Soldier creature token. You may attach an Equipment you control to it.
trans-unit.target: +2：派出一个1/1白色寇族／士兵衍生生物。你可以将一个由你操控的武具贴附于其上。

trans-unit.resname: C14·10 | Nahiri, the Lithomancer | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: [−2]: You may put an Equipment card from your hand or graveyard onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: −2：你可以将一张武具牌从你手上或坟墓场放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: C14·10 | Nahiri, the Lithomancer | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: [−10]: Create a colorless Equipment artifact token named Stoneforged Blade. It has indestructible, "Equipped creature gets +5/+5 and has double strike," and equip {0}.
trans-unit.target: −10：派出一个名称为锻石砾刃的无色武具衍生神器。它具有不灭，「佩带此武具的生物得+5/+5且具有连击异能」与佩带{0}。

trans-unit.resname: C14·10 | Nahiri, the Lithomancer | Card Text | Paragraph 4
C14·11 | Aether Gale | Card Name
C14·11 | Aether Gale | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return six target nonland permanents to their owners' hands.
trans-unit.target: 将六个目标非地永久物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: C14·12 | Breaching Leviathan | Card Name
C14·12 | Breaching Leviathan | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand, tap all nonblue creatures. Those creatures don't untap during their controllers' next untap steps.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，若你从你手上施放之，则横置所有非蓝色的生物。这些生物于其操控者的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.resname: C14·13 | Domineering Will | Card Name
C14·13 | Domineering Will | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target player gains control of up to three target nonattacking creatures until end of turn. Untap those creatures. They block this turn if able.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手获得至多三个目标非进行攻击之生物的操控权直到回合结束。重置这些生物。它们本回合若能进行阻挡，则须如此作。

trans-unit.resname: C14·14 | Dulcet Sirens | Card Name
C14·14 | Dulcet Sirens | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {U}, {T}: Target creature attacks target opponent this turn if able.
trans-unit.target: {U}，{T}：目标生物本回合若能攻击目标对手，则必须如此作。

trans-unit.resname: C14·14 | Dulcet Sirens | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Morph {U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
trans-unit.target: 变身{U}（你可牌面朝下地施放此牌并支付{3}，将其当成2/2生物。可随时支付其变身费用使其翻回正面。）

trans-unit.resname: C14·15 | Intellectual Offering | Card Name
C14·15 | Intellectual Offering | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose an opponent. You and that player each draw three cards.
trans-unit.target: 选择一位对手。你和该牌手各抓三张牌。

trans-unit.resname: C14·15 | Intellectual Offering | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Choose an opponent. Untap all nonland permanents you control and all nonland permanents that player controls.
trans-unit.target: 选择一位对手。重置由你操控的所有非地永久物和由该牌手操控的所有非地永久物。

trans-unit.resname: C14·16 | Reef Worm | Card Name
C14·16 | Reef Worm | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, create a 3/3 blue Fish creature token with "When this creature dies, create a 6/6 blue Whale creature token with 'When this creature dies, create a 9/9 blue Kraken creature token.'"
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去时，派出一个3/3蓝色的鱼衍生生物，且具有「当此生物死去时，派出一个6/6蓝色鲸鱼衍生生物，且具有『当此生物死去时，派出一个9/9蓝色巨海兽衍生生物。』」

trans-unit.resname: C14·17 | Stitcher Geralf | Card Name
C14·17 | Stitcher Geralf | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {2}{U}, {T}: Each player mills three cards. Exile up to two creature cards put into graveyards this way. Create an X/X blue Zombie creature token, where X is the total power of the cards exiled this way.
trans-unit.target: {2}{U}，{T}：每位牌手各磨三张牌。放逐至多两张以此法进入坟墓场的生物牌。派出一个X/X蓝色灵俑衍生生物，X为以此法放逐各牌的力量总和。

trans-unit.resname: C14·18 | Stormsurge Kraken | Card Name
C14·18 | Stormsurge Kraken | Card Text | Paragraph 1
C14·18 | Stormsurge Kraken | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Lieutenant — As long as you control your commander, CARDNAME gets +2/+2 and has "Whenever CARDNAME becomes blocked, you may draw two cards."
trans-unit.target: 副官～只要你操控你的指挥官，CARDNAME便得+2/+2且具有「每当CARDNAME被阻挡时，你可以抓两张牌。」

trans-unit.resname: C14·19 | Teferi, Temporal Archmage | Card Name
C14·19 | Teferi, Temporal Archmage | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: [+1]: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.
trans-unit.target: +1：检视你牌库顶的两张牌。将其中一张置于你手上，另一张则置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: C14·19 | Teferi, Temporal Archmage | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: [−1]: Untap up to four target permanents.

trans-unit.resname: C14·19 | Teferi, Temporal Archmage | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: [−10]: You get an emblem with "You may activate loyalty abilities of planeswalkers you control on any player's turn any time you could cast an instant."
trans-unit.target: −10：你获得具有以下异能的徽记～「你可以在任意牌手的回合中，于你能够施放瞬间的时机下，起动由你操控之鹏洛客的忠诚异能。」

trans-unit.resname: C14·19 | Teferi, Temporal Archmage | Card Text | Paragraph 4
C14·20 | Well of Ideas | Card Name
C14·20 | Well of Ideas | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, draw two cards.

trans-unit.resname: C14·20 | Well of Ideas | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each other player's draw step, that player draws an additional card.
trans-unit.target: 在每位其他牌手的抓牌步骤开始时，该牌手额外抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: C14·20 | Well of Ideas | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your draw step, draw two additional cards.
trans-unit.target: 在你的抓牌步骤开始时，额外抓两张牌。

trans-unit.resname: C14·21 | Demon of Wailing Agonies | Card Name
C14·21 | Demon of Wailing Agonies | Card Text | Paragraph 1
C14·21 | Demon of Wailing Agonies | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Lieutenant — As long as you control your commander, CARDNAME gets +2/+2 and has "Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, that player sacrifices a creature."
trans-unit.target: 副官～只要你操控你的指挥官，CARDNAME便得+2/+2且具有「每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，该牌手牺牲一个生物。」

trans-unit.resname: C14·22 | Flesh Carver | Card Name
C14·22 | Flesh Carver | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)

trans-unit.resname: C14·22 | Flesh Carver | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {1}{B}, Sacrifice another creature: Put two +1/+1 counters on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: {1}{B}，牺牲另一个生物：在CARDNAME上放置两个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: C14·22 | Flesh Carver | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, create an X/X black Horror creature token, where X is CARDNAME's power.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME死去时，将一个X/X黑色惊惧兽衍生生物放进战场，X为CARDNAME的力量。

trans-unit.resname: C14·23 | Ghoulcaller Gisa | Card Name
C14·23 | Ghoulcaller Gisa | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {B}, {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Create X 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens, where X is the sacrificed creature's power.
trans-unit.target: {B}，{T}，牺牲另一个生物：派出X个2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物，X为所牺牲生物的力量。

trans-unit.resname: C14·24 | Infernal Offering | Card Name
C14·24 | Infernal Offering | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose an opponent. You and that player each sacrifice a creature. Each player who sacrificed a creature this way draws two cards.
trans-unit.target: 选择一位对手。你和该牌手各牺牲一个生物。每位以此法牺牲生物的牌手各抓两张牌。

trans-unit.resname: C14·24 | Infernal Offering | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Choose an opponent. Return a creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield, then that player returns a creature card from their graveyard to the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 选择一位对手。将一张生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场，然后该牌手将一张生物牌从其坟墓场移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: C14·25 | Malicious Affliction | Card Name
C14·25 | Malicious Affliction | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Morbid — When you cast this spell, if a creature died this turn, you may copy CARDNAME and may choose a new target for the copy.
trans-unit.target: 丧心～当你施放CARDNAME时，若本回合有生物死去，则你可以复制CARDNAME，且可以为该复制品选择新的目标。

trans-unit.resname: C14·25 | Malicious Affliction | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标非黑色的生物。

trans-unit.resname: C14·26 | Necromantic Selection | Card Name
C14·26 | Necromantic Selection | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy all creatures, then return a creature card put into a graveyard this way to the battlefield under your control. It's a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types. Exile CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有生物，然后将一张以此法进入坟墓场的生物牌在你的操控下移回战场。它额外具有黑色此颜色与灵俑此类别。放逐CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: C14·27 | Ob Nixilis of the Black Oath | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ob Nixilis of the Black Oath

trans-unit.resname: C14·27 | Ob Nixilis of the Black Oath | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: [+2]: Each opponent loses 1 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.
trans-unit.target: +2：每位对手各失去1点生命。你获得若干生命，其数量等同于以此法失去的生命总和。

trans-unit.resname: C14·27 | Ob Nixilis of the Black Oath | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: [−2]: Create a 5/5 black Demon creature token with flying. You lose 2 life.
trans-unit.target: −2：派出一个5/5黑色，具飞行异能的恶魔衍生生物。你失去2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: C14·27 | Ob Nixilis of the Black Oath | Card Text | Paragraph 3

trans-unit.target: −8：你获得具有以下异能的徽记～「{1}{B}，牺牲一个生物：你获得X点生命且抓X张牌，X为所牺牲生物的力量。」

trans-unit.resname: C14·27 | Ob Nixilis of the Black Oath | Card Text | Paragraph 4
C14·28 | Overseer of the Damned | Card Name
C14·28 | Overseer of the Damned | Card Text | Paragraph 1
C14·28 | Overseer of the Damned | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may destroy target creature.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以消灭目标生物。

trans-unit.resname: C14·28 | Overseer of the Damned | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever a nontoken creature an opponent controls dies, create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由对手操控且非衍生物的生物死去时，你派出一个已横置的2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: C14·29 | Raving Dead | Card Name
C14·29 | Raving Dead | Card Text | Paragraph 1
C14·29 | Raving Dead | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose an opponent at random. CARDNAME attacks that player this combat if able.
trans-unit.target: 在你回合的战斗开始时，随机选择一位对手。CARDNAME本次战斗若能攻击该牌手，则必须如此作。

trans-unit.resname: C14·29 | Raving Dead | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, that player loses half their life, rounded down.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，该牌手失去一半数量的生命，小数点后舍去。

trans-unit.resname: C14·30 | Spoils of Blood | Card Name
C14·30 | Spoils of Blood | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Create an X/X black Horror creature token, where X is the number of creatures that died this turn.
trans-unit.target: 将一个X/X黑色惊惧兽衍生生物放进战场，X为于本回合中死去的生物数量。

trans-unit.resname: C14·31 | Wake the Dead | Card Name
C14·31 | Wake the Dead | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Cast this spell only during combat on an opponent's turn.
trans-unit.target: 只能于对手回合的战斗中施放此咒语。

trans-unit.resname: C14·31 | Wake the Dead | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Return X target creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield. Sacrifice those creatures at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: 将X张目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。在下一个结束步骤开始时牺牲这些生物。

trans-unit.resname: C14·32 | Bitter Feud | Card Name
C14·32 | Bitter Feud | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose two players.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进战场时，选择两位牌手。

trans-unit.resname: C14·32 | Bitter Feud | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: If a source controlled by one of the chosen players would deal damage to the other chosen player or a permanent that player controls, that source deals double that damage to that player or permanent instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果由其中一位牌手操控的某个来源将对其中另一位牌手或由他操控的某个永久物造成伤害，则改为该来源对后者牌手或永久物造成两倍的伤害。

trans-unit.resname: C14·33 | Daretti, Scrap Savant | Card Name
C14·33 | Daretti, Scrap Savant | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: [+2]: Discard up to two cards, then draw that many cards.
trans-unit.target: +2：弃至多两张牌，然后抓等量的牌。

trans-unit.resname: C14·33 | Daretti, Scrap Savant | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: [−2]: Sacrifice an artifact. If you do, return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: −2：牺牲一个神器。如果你如此作，则将目标神器牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: C14·33 | Daretti, Scrap Savant | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: [−10]: You get an emblem with "Whenever an artifact is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, return that card to the battlefield at the beginning of the next end step."
trans-unit.target: −10：你获得具有以下异能的徽记～「每当一个神器从战场进入你的坟墓场，在下一个结束步骤开始时，将该牌移回战场。」

trans-unit.resname: C14·33 | Daretti, Scrap Savant | Card Text | Paragraph 4
C14·34 | Dualcaster Mage | Card Name
C14·34 | Dualcaster Mage | Card Text | Paragraph 1
C14·34 | Dualcaster Mage | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，复制目标瞬间或法术咒语。你可以为该复制品选择新的目标。

trans-unit.resname: C14·35 | Feldon of the Third Path | Card Name
C14·35 | Feldon of the Third Path | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {2}{R}, {T}: Create a token that's a copy of target creature card in your graveyard, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types. It gains haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: {2}{R}，{T}：派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为目标在你坟墓场中的生物牌之复制品，但它额外具有神器此类别。它获得敏捷异能。在下一个结束步骤开始时将它牺牲。

trans-unit.resname: C14·36 | Impact Resonance | Card Name
C14·36 | Impact Resonance | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures, where X is the greatest amount of damage dealt by a source to a permanent or player this turn.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对任意数量的目标生物造成共X点伤害，你可以任意分配，X为本回合单一来源对单一永久物或牌手造成的伤害中，数量最大者的数值。

trans-unit.resname: C14·37 | Incite Rebellion | Card Name
C14·37 | Incite Rebellion | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: For each player, CARDNAME deals damage to that player and each creature that player controls equal to the number of creatures they control.
trans-unit.target: 对每位牌手而言，CARDNAME对该牌手和由该牌手操控的每个生物各造成伤害，其数量等同于由他操控的生物数量。

trans-unit.resname: C14·38 | Scrap Mastery | Card Name
C14·38 | Scrap Mastery | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each player exiles all artifact cards from their graveyard, then sacrifices all artifacts they control, then puts all cards they exiled this way onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 每位牌手各从其坟墓场中放逐所有神器牌，然后牺牲由他操控的所有神器，然后将他以此法放逐的所有牌放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: C14·39 | Tyrant's Familiar | Card Name
C14·39 | Tyrant's Familiar | Card Text | Paragraph 1
C14·39 | Tyrant's Familiar | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Lieutenant — As long as you control your commander, CARDNAME gets +2/+2 and has "Whenever CARDNAME attacks, it deals 7 damage to target creature defending player controls."

C14·51 | Wave of Vitriol | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each player sacrifices all artifacts, enchantments, and nonbasic lands they control. For each land sacrificed this way, its controller may search their library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then each player who searched their library this way shuffles.
trans-unit.target: 每位牌手各牺牲由他操控的所有神器，结界和非基本地。对每个以此法牺牲的地而言，其操控者可以从其牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌并将之横置进战场。然后每位以此法搜寻牌库的牌手将其牌库洗牌。
